Title: Verify Claim Creation with Policy Search and Claimant Details
Steps(Step):
1. Navigate to ClaimCenter application.
2. Click on the Claim Tab expand button.
3. Click on the 'New Claim' menu item.
4. Enter 'CHO075170006' in the Policy # field.
5. Enter '02/01/2026' in the date field.
6. Enter '10:10' in the time field.
7. Click the Time of Loss AM/PM button to toggle.
8. Click the 'Search' button.
9. Click the 'Next' button.
10. Select 'Person:1757311' from the Name dropdown.
11. Select 'self' from the Relation to Insured dropdown.
12. Select 'No' radio button for Agree To Email Communication.
13. Select 'none' from the Preferred Method of Contact dropdown.
14. Select 'No' radio button for Requested.
15. Click the 'Next' button.
Steps(Expected Result):
1. ClaimCenter application is displayed.
2. Claim Tab menu is expanded.
3. New Claim page is displayed.
4. Policy # 'CHO075170006' is entered successfully.
5. Date '02/01/2026' is entered and accepted.
6. Time '10:10' is entered and formatted.
7. Time format is toggled between AM and PM.
8. Policy search is executed and results are displayed.
9. Claimant details page is displayed.
10. 'Person:1757311' is selected from Name dropdown.
